title: People can't park 2

comments.body: Next time they do that just push their vehicle aside let it fall just make sure it doesn't fall over other vehicles then they will learn a lesson.

One idiot did that twice and left his helmet hanging on my scooter. I couldnt even remove the stand so his helmet got crushed between my scooter and his scooty lmao. Not our problem people don't have an ounce of brain to park properly

Never attribute to malice that which is adequately explained by stupidity.

Who knows, maybe, there was another vehicle to the right of the bike beforehand. I can't imagine anyone parking this close by choice.
I agree, its still annoying either ways to have you vehicle pushed/ moved!
I agree, its still annoying either ways to have you vehicle pushed/ moved!
I agree, its still annoying either ways to have you vehicle pushed/ moved!
That looks like an Ather! Good choice
